backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profile authorization plus in‑memory maps for brands, appliances, and products with sample seeded data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing required icon replacements and asset additions for the React frontend.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files including config, hooks, components, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup with custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point linking favicon and loading the React app root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main UI showing service cards, header with static image icons, and triggers for the booking dialog.
frontend/src/components/BookServiceDialo: Service booking dialog handling form state, validation, and submission via createServiceRequest.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries.
Empty file placeholder for appliance‑brand mapping hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateServiceReque: React Query mutation hook that submits a service request through the backend actor and invalidates related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, loading saved identities, and exposing login state helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks that fetch appliances, brands, and appliance-specific brands using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with extensive CSS variables for theme colors, dark mode, and global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with ReactDOM, wrapping it in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility methods for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored parameters.
frontend/src/vite-env.d.ts: Defines TypeScript types for Vite environment variables.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors from CSS variables, extended theme options, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project's state, versions, required features, and pending requests including icon replacement and Google indexing.
